title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file using WSWB, the export process fails.
EB: The export process should successfully create a zip file with all the files included, even if they have the same name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects.
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt').
3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose 'Zip File' as the export option.
4. Proceed with the export process.
